headline: Should FedEx’s (FDX) Debt Restructuring and Leadership Shift Prompt a Fresh Look at Efficiency?
summary: FedEx Corporation recently announced a broad fixed-income exchange offer across multiple series of senior unsecured notes, coinciding with executive leadership changes and governance-related shareholder proposals that have been addressed at its latest annual meeting. This combination of capital structure actions and digital transformation leadership highlights a period of significant operational and governance evolution for the company. We’ll explore how FedEx’s fixed-income exchange offer...
